welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Somerset, a charming city known for its breathtaking natural beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy our unique attractions and experiences during your stay here. We hope you have a wonderful time in Somerset!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within the United States.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from the United States.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: There is no designated international terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport, as all flights are domestic.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private aviation services, offering amenities for private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
